description:
Inui, head coach for the Touto Boys, had remained completely silent until now, viewing the Dolphins as 2nd rate.
However, having them catch up, he finally stirs.
He commands their number 4 batter, Mayumura Wataru, to sacrifice himself, and with a squeeze play, 
they rapidly add two points to their score and pull away from the Dolphins.
On top of that, Touto`s ace, Mayumura Michiru, despite not being warmed up, racks up strike-out after strike-out, and the game is in the final inning.
But for the Dolphins, too, Daigo and Urabe make it out on base, then with one out and loaded bases, their number 4, Hikaru, is up to bat...
Source: crunchyroll
